text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the light
Morning feels just right
Shadows fade away
New day on display

[Chorus]
Sunshine in my eyes
Blue skies no disguise
Laughing just because
Life is full of buzz

[Verse 2]
We chase dreams so wild
Free like a child
Nothing holds us back
On this endless track

[Chorus]
Sunshine in my eyes
Blue skies no disguise
Laughing just because
Life is full of buzz

[Bridge]
Every step we take
Every move we make
Together we’ll go far
Shining like a star

[Chorus]
Sunshine in my eyes
Blue skies no disguise
Laughing just because
Life is full of buzz
title: Sunshine and Shadows
